businesslayer

Class TutorBusinessLogic

  • java.lang.Object
    • businesslayer.TutorBusinessLogic

  • public class TutorBusinessLogic
extends java.lang.Object
    The TutorBusinessLogic class contains the business logic methods for managing tutors in the tutoring application.
    Since:
    1.0
    See Also:

      • addTutorToTutorcourseTable

        public void addTutorToTutorcourseTable(TutorDTO tutor,
                                       java.lang.String courseCode)
                                throws ValidationException
        Adds the specified tutor to the tutorcourse table.
        Parameters:
        tutor - the TutorDTO object representing the tutor to be added
        courseCode - the course code for the tutorcourse record
        Throws:
        ValidationException - if the tutor data is not in a valid format
